channel.title: ::teleall command?
channel.description:
I was wondering if there was a tele all command somewhere.Like instead of using ::xteletome -username here- i could say that one command and have everyone tele to me.
is there such a command out there? i have treid many things, but they never work...

item.title: ::teleall command?
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“ipkzz, post:8, topic:5939”] if (command.equals(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client
castOn.teleportToX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord
castOn.teleportToY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord

            }            
        }        
    }[/quote]Bro look when this topic was made... 2006, look when the last reply was... 2008.... Don't Grave Dig

Read full topic

item.title: ::teleall command?
item.dc:creator: @ipkzz ipkzz
item.description:
@ipkzz wrote:

    if (command.equals("xteleall") && playerRights >= 3) {
        for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
            if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function                    
                client castOn = (client) p; // specific player's client                    
                castOn.teleportToX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord                    
                castOn.teleportToY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord                
      
            }            
        }        
    }

Read full topic

item.title: ::teleall command?
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

That’s a spam XD.

But dude… The code is-

[code]
if (command.equals(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client

                castOn.teleportToX = absX; // replace with your tele X coord
                castOn.teleportToY = absY; // replace with your tele Y coord
            }
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: ::teleall command?
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("teleall")) { for (int i = 0; i < PlayerHandler.players.length; i++) { client tmp = (client) PlayerHandler.players[i]; tmp.teleportToX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8)); tmp.teleportToY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); } }

Try it, I don’t know if it will work. I just wrote this from scratch, and I don’t have a CheezScape source to test it on.

Read full topic
